_metadata.methodology: 3-year weighted average with recency weighting (Y1: 0.5, Y2: 0.3, Y3: 0.2)
_metadata.notes: Exchange rates are TWD to foreign currency (1 TWD = X foreign). Example: USA 0.0315 means 1 TWD buys 0.0315 USD. Flight costs are round-trip from TPE. CoL is monthly budget for digital nomad lifestyle.

exchange_rate.notes: Bank of Japan rate. 1 TWD = ~4.65 JPY. ~145-155 JPY/USD, ~30-32 TWD/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-NRT/HND direct, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Shared apartment or small studio in 23 wards

exchange_rate.notes: Bank of Korea rate. 1 TWD = ~42 KRW. ~1300-1400 KRW/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-ICN direct, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Officetel or small apartment outside Gangnam

exchange_rate.notes: HKD pegged to USD, very stable. 1 TWD = ~0.247 HKD. ~7.75-7.85 HKD/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-HKG direct, economy, round-trip, ~1.5 hour flight

monthly_col_usd.notes: One of world's most expensive cities, shared flat typical

exchange_rate.notes: People's Bank of China rate. 1 TWD = ~0.221 CNY. ~7.0-7.3 CNY/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-PVG/SHA direct, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Varies greatly by tier of city

exchange_rate.notes: Bank of Thailand rate. 1 TWD = ~1.1 THB. ~33-36 THB/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-BKK direct, economy, round-trip, popular nomad destination

monthly_col_usd.notes: Very popular digital nomad destination, good value

exchange_rate.notes: State Bank of Vietnam rate. 1 TWD = ~787 VND. ~24,000-25,500 VND/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-SGN/HAN direct, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Very affordable, growing nomad scene

exchange_rate.notes: Bank Negara Malaysia rate. 1 TWD = ~0.14 MYR. ~4.4-4.7 MYR/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-KUL direct, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Good infrastructure, English-speaking, nomad-friendly

exchange_rate.notes: Bank Indonesia rate. 1 TWD = ~505 IDR. ~15,500-16,500 IDR/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-CGK/DPS, may require connection, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Bali very popular for nomads, Jakarta cheaper

exchange_rate.notes: Bangko Sentral ng Pilipinas rate. 1 TWD = ~1.77 PHP. ~55-58 PHP/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-MNL direct, economy, round-trip, short flight

monthly_col_usd.notes: English-speaking, growing startup scene

exchange_rate.notes: Monetary Authority of Singapore rate. 1 TWD = ~0.0426 SGD. ~1.32-1.38 SGD/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-SIN direct, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Very expensive, but excellent infrastructure

exchange_rate.notes: Reserve Bank of India rate. 1 TWD = ~2.63 INR. ~82-85 INR/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-DEL/BOM, usually one stop, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Very affordable, tech hubs in Bangalore/Hyderabad

exchange_rate.notes: Bank of England rate. 1 TWD = ~0.0249 GBP. ~0.78-0.82 GBP/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-LHR, usually one stop, economy, round-trip, ~15-18 hours

monthly_col_usd.notes: London very expensive, other UK cities more affordable

exchange_rate.notes: European Central Bank rate. 1 TWD = ~0.0292 EUR. ~0.90-0.95 EUR/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-FRA, usually one stop, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Berlin relatively affordable for Western Europe

exchange_rate.notes: European Central Bank rate. 1 TWD = ~0.0292 EUR. Same as Germany

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-CDG, usually one stop, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Paris expensive, but smaller cities much cheaper

exchange_rate.notes: European Central Bank rate. 1 TWD = ~0.0292 EUR

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-MAD/BCN, usually one stop, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: More affordable than Northern Europe, popular nomad spots

exchange_rate.notes: European Central Bank rate. 1 TWD = ~0.0292 EUR

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-LIS, usually one stop, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Very popular nomad destination, good weather year-round

exchange_rate.notes: European Central Bank rate. 1 TWD = ~0.0292 EUR

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-AMS, usually one stop, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Housing very expensive, but good quality of life

exchange_rate.notes: Federal Reserve rate. 1 TWD = ~0.0315 USD. Base currency for comparison.

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-LAX/SFO, direct or one stop, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Varies dramatically by city, coastal cities very expensive

exchange_rate.notes: Banco de Mexico rate. 1 TWD = ~0.55 MXN. ~17-18 MXN/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-MEX, usually one stop via USA/Japan, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Very popular nomad destination, good food and culture

exchange_rate.notes: Banco de la Republica rate. 1 TWD = ~128 COP. ~4000-4200 COP/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-BOG, usually 2 stops, economy, round-trip, long journey

monthly_col_usd.notes: Growing nomad scene, especially Medellin

exchange_rate.notes: Banco Central. 1 TWD = ~28.6 ARS. HIGHLY VOLATILE. Blue dollar rate often differs significantly.

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-EZE, usually 2 stops, economy, round-trip, very long journey

monthly_col_usd.notes: Currency volatility makes budgeting difficult

exchange_rate.notes: Central Bank of UAE. 1 TWD = ~0.116 AED. AED pegged to USD at 3.6725, very stable.

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-DXB, direct Emirates available, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Expensive but tax-free income

exchange_rate.notes: Central Bank of Turkey. 1 TWD = ~1.05 TRY. HIGHLY VOLATILE. ~32-36 TRY/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-IST, one stop, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Currency volatility affects CoL significantly

exchange_rate.notes: Reserve Bank of Australia rate. 1 TWD = ~0.048 AUD. ~0.65-0.70 AUD/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-SYD, direct available, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: High quality of life but expensive, especially Sydney/Melbourne

exchange_rate.notes: Reserve Bank of New Zealand rate. 1 TWD = ~0.052 NZD. ~0.60-0.65 NZD/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-AKL, usually one stop, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Beautiful country, good work-life balance

exchange_rate.notes: National Bank of Georgia rate. 1 TWD = ~0.085 GEL. ~2.65-2.75 GEL/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-TBS, usually 1-2 stops via IST or DOH, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Top digital nomad destination, 1-year visa-free, very affordable

exchange_rate.notes: European Central Bank rate. 1 TWD = ~0.0292 EUR

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-TLL, usually 1-2 stops, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Digital nomad visa pioneer, e-Residency program, tech hub

exchange_rate.notes: European Central Bank rate. Croatia joined eurozone Jan 2023

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-ZAG, usually 1-2 stops, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Digital nomad visa available, beautiful coast, EU member

exchange_rate.notes: Czech National Bank rate. 1 TWD = ~0.73 CZK. ~23-24 CZK/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-PRG, usually one stop, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Major nomad hub, beautiful architecture, good infrastructure

exchange_rate.notes: National Bank of Poland rate. 1 TWD = ~0.128 PLN. ~4.0-4.2 PLN/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-WAW, usually one stop, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Growing tech hub, affordable for Europe, good internet

exchange_rate.notes: Hungarian National Bank rate. 1 TWD = ~11.5 HUF. ~360-380 HUF/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-BUD, usually one stop, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Popular nomad destination, thermal baths, ruin bars culture

exchange_rate.notes: European Central Bank rate. 1 TWD = ~0.0292 EUR

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-ATH, usually one stop, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Digital nomad visa available, islands lifestyle, good weather

exchange_rate.notes: Bank of Albania rate. 1 TWD = ~3.0 ALL. ~95-100 ALL/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-TIA, usually 2 stops, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Very affordable, growing scene, beautiful coast

exchange_rate.notes: National Bank of Romania rate. 1 TWD = ~0.147 RON. ~4.6-4.8 RON/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-OTP, usually 1-2 stops, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Tech hub, fast internet, affordable EU member

exchange_rate.notes: Bulgarian National Bank rate. BGN pegged to EUR. 1 TWD = ~0.057 BGN

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-SOF, usually 1-2 stops, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Very affordable EU member, growing tech scene

exchange_rate.notes: Central Bank of Brazil rate. 1 TWD = ~0.158 BRL. ~5.0-5.3 BRL/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-GRU, usually 1-2 stops, economy, round-trip, long journey

monthly_col_usd.notes: Large country, Rio/Floripa nomad scenes, cultural richness

exchange_rate.notes: Central Reserve Bank of Peru rate. 1 TWD = ~0.118 PEN. ~3.7-3.9 PEN/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-LIM, usually 2 stops, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Growing nomad scene, Machu Picchu tourism, food culture

exchange_rate.notes: Central Bank of Costa Rica rate. 1 TWD = ~16.2 CRC. ~510-530 CRC/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-SJO, usually 1-2 stops via USA, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Stable country, nature-focused, nomad friendly, pura vida lifestyle

exchange_rate.notes: Central Bank of Chile rate. 1 TWD = ~29.5 CLP. ~920-970 CLP/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-SCL, usually 2 stops, economy, round-trip, long journey

monthly_col_usd.notes: Most developed Latin American country, Patagonia access

exchange_rate.notes: Panama uses USD (Balboa pegged 1:1). Same as USA rate.

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-PTY, usually 1-2 stops via USA, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Tax friendly, hub city, dollarized economy, canal tourism

exchange_rate.notes: National Bank of Cambodia rate. 1 TWD = ~128 KHR. USD widely used. ~4050-4100 KHR/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-PNH, direct or one stop, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Very affordable, Siem Reap for temples, growing nomad scene

exchange_rate.notes: Bank of Laos rate. 1 TWD = ~670 LAK. High volatility. ~20,500-21,500 LAK/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-VTE, usually one stop via BKK, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Ultra low CoL, relaxed visa, laid-back lifestyle, Luang Prabang

exchange_rate.notes: Central Bank of Sri Lanka rate. 1 TWD = ~9.5 LKR. Currency stabilizing post-crisis. ~300-320 LKR/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-CMB, usually one stop via SIN/KUL, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Post-recovery destination, beach + culture, affordable

exchange_rate.notes: Nepal Rastra Bank rate. NPR pegged to INR. 1 TWD = ~4.2 NPR. ~133-135 NPR/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-KTM, usually one stop, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Ultra low CoL, adventure base, trekking paradise, spiritual

exchange_rate.notes: Bank Al-Maghrib rate. 1 TWD = ~0.32 MAD. ~10.0-10.3 MAD/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-CMN, usually 1-2 stops, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Marrakech nomad scene, close to EU, rich culture

exchange_rate.notes: South African Reserve Bank rate. 1 TWD = ~0.58 ZAR. ~18-19 ZAR/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-CPT, usually 1-2 stops, economy, round-trip, long journey

monthly_col_usd.notes: Cape Town nomad hub, beautiful scenery, good infrastructure

exchange_rate.notes: Central Bank of Egypt rate. Currency volatile. 1 TWD = ~1.55 EGP. ~48-52 EGP/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-CAI, usually one stop, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Historical wonders, very low CoL, pyramids and culture

exchange_rate.notes: Central Bank of Kenya rate. 1 TWD = ~4.05 KES. ~128-135 KES/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-NBO, usually 1-2 stops, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Nairobi tech hub (Silicon Savannah), safari access, startup scene

exchange_rate.notes: Bank of Israel rate. 1 TWD = ~0.116 ILS. ~3.6-3.8 ILS/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-TLV, usually one stop, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Tech hub, startup nation, beach lifestyle, high CoL

exchange_rate.notes: Central Bank of Iceland rate. 1 TWD = ~4.35 ISK. ~137-142 ISK/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-KEF, usually 1-2 stops, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Very expensive, stunning nature, remote work friendly

exchange_rate.notes: Bank of Canada rate. 1 TWD = ~0.0432 CAD. ~1.35-1.40 CAD/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-YVR, direct available, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: High quality of life, multicultural, beautiful nature

exchange_rate.notes: Swiss National Bank rate. 1 TWD = ~0.028 CHF. ~0.88-0.92 CHF/USD

flight_cost_twd.notes: TPE-ZRH, usually one stop, economy, round-trip

monthly_col_usd.notes: Most expensive country, exceptional quality, Alps access

_validation.exchange_rate_direction: All rates are TWD to foreign (1 TWD = X foreign currency)
